column4: I have an ubuntu CD that is working good, if I decide to install it, can i still get to my windows operating system?
if you install using wubi inside of windows or if you dual boot you can still get to windows
you have the option when yous tart the machine to load ubuntu or windows
with wubi you don't have to mess with partitioning etc... Then you can remove it later if you don't want it anymore.
